nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache

Class PasswordCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache.PasswordCache

  • public class PasswordCache
extends Object
    Class that caches passwords for a limited time so that the user doesn't need to type in the password everytime.

    TODO move swing stuff into gui, implement cli as well, auto-select cli/gui this can be done by implementing this class with callbacks for asking the user for passwords. Different UIs can then use their own callbacks, and even the tests can use this to test easily without user intervention.

    Author:
    wvengen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  PasswordCache.ForgetTask
      Timer task that removes the cached password after timeout

      • getInstance

        public static PasswordCache getInstance()
        Retrieve singleton object

      • setParent

        public void setParent(JFrame parent)
        Set the parent for dialogs

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int s)
        Set the timeout after which passwords are forgotten again.

        Also updates timeout of currently stored passwords.

        Parameters:
        s - timeout in number of seconds, or <0 to keep forever

      • getTimeout

        public int getTimeout()
        Return the current password timeout.
        See Also:
        setTimeout(int)

      • setUI

        public void setUI(int ui)
        Set the user-interface backend.
        Parameters:
        ui - One of UI_NONE, UI_GUI and UI_CLI

      • getUI

        public int getUI()
        Return the current user-interface backend.

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(String loc)
        Invalidate a cache entry

      • getForDecrypt

        public char[] getForDecrypt(String msg,
                            String loc)
                     throws PasswordCancelledException
        Return the password for the specified location to decrypt files

        Each item has a unique reference to a required password consisting of a location string.

        Parameters:
        msg - Message to present to the user when asking for a password. Actual message is "Enter password to unlock "+msg
        loc - Location string
        Returns:
        password
        Throws:
        PasswordCancelledException

      • getForEncrypt

        public char[] getForEncrypt(String msg,
                            String loc)
                     throws PasswordCancelledException
        Return a new password for the specified location.

        Also ask for a password and require to enter twice for verification. This is for encrypting data. The password is remembered for the case it is read again.

        Parameters:
        msg - Description presented to the user when asking for a password.
        loc - Location string
        Returns:
        password
        Throws:
        PasswordCancelledException

      • set

        public void set(String loc,
                char[] pw)
        Set a password for a location.

        Should not be used normally because the user is the one to give the password. For testing this is convenient.

        Parameters:
        loc - Location string
        pw - password to set

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Completely clear the cache so that no passwords are present.

      • touch

        protected void touch(String loc)
        Reset the forget timeout for a location. Password mustexist already.

      • setAlwaysAskForEncrypt

        public boolean setAlwaysAskForEncrypt(boolean alwaysAsk)
        Set whether or not to always ask a password for encryption. Usually you would want this, but for machine-generated temporary passwords this may not be desired.

      • getEncryptPasswordFinder

        protected nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache.PasswordCache.CachePasswordFinder getEncryptPasswordFinder(String msg,
                                                                                                        String loc)
        Return a PasswordFinder that asks the user for a password when encrypting a file. The password is retrieved using getForEncrypt(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        msg - Description on what this key is about
        loc - Location string
        Returns:
        a new PasswordFinder

      • getDecryptPasswordFinder

        protected nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache.PasswordCache.CachePasswordFinder getDecryptPasswordFinder(String msg,
                                                                                                        String loc)
        Return a PasswordFinder that returns the cached password, or else asks the user to provide one. The password is retrieved using getForDecrypt(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        msg - Description on what this key is about
        loc - Location string
        Returns:
        a new PasswordFinder
